name: Planetoid TD
description:
As Above So Below: - Play against yourself in this First Person Sci-Fi Mirrored Tower Defence Game!

Building a resource building on one planet will mirror it on the planet below as an attack building!

The key to success is to balance attack / resource buildings on both planets so that both have a strong defence against the incoming waves!

If you lose either planet you lose the game!

Try to survive as long as you can! Your score will be recorded at the end :D 

Q - to Enter Build Mode

WASD - to move around the planets

SPACE - to go up!

SHIFT - to go down

Left Mouse - Shoot and Build

Scroll - to switch buildings

R - to Restart

Assets that aren't Originally made:
